com.concordium.sdk.transactions

Class TransactionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.concordium.sdk.transactions.TransactionFactory

  • public class TransactionFactory
extends Object
    Provides convenient builders for account transactions.

    Example: Create a CCD transfer transaction 
     
 AccountTransaction tx =
      TransactionFactory
          .newTransfer(new Transfer(receiverAccountAddress, ccdAmount))
          .sender(senderAccountAddress)
          .nonce(senderNonce)
          .expiry(Expiry.createNew().addMinutes(5))
          .sign(senderSigner)

    Example: Create a sponsored CCD transfer transaction on the sponsor's server: 
     
 PartiallySignedSponsoredTransaction partiallySignedTx =
      TransactionFactory
          .newTransfer(new Transfer(receiverAccountAddress, ccdAmount))
          .sender(senderAccountAddress)
          .nonce(senderNonce)
          .expiry(Expiry.createNew().addMinutes(5))
          .sponsoredBy(sponsorAccountAddress)
          .signAsSponsor(sponsorSigner)

    Example: Complete a sponsored CCD transfer transaction in the sender's wallet: 
     
 AccountTransactionV1 tx =
      TransactionFactory
          .completeSponsoredTransaction(partiallySignedTx)
          .asSender(senderSigner)

      • newPayloadSubmission

        public static TransactionFactory.PayloadSubmissionBuilder newPayloadSubmission(@NonNull
                                                                               @NonNull Payload payload,
                                                                               @NonNull
                                                                               @NonNull UInt64 transactionSpecificCost)
        General account transaction builder. Using it requires specifying the cost (max energy that can be spent on executing this transaction) explicitly.
        For specific transactions, such as transfer, protocol-level token transaction, etc. use dedicated builders.

      • newTokenUpdate

        public static TransactionFactory.PayloadSubmissionBuilder newTokenUpdate(@NonNull
                                                                         @NonNull TokenUpdate tokenUpdate)
        A builder for a protocol-level token state update transaction. This is the entry point, while the actual token operations (transfer, etc.) are defined by the TokenUpdate payload.
